## Quick start

```{r}
x <- symbol('x')
eq <- 2*x^2 - x
eq
as.character(eq)
as_r(eq)
tex(eq)
```

\[
  `r tex(eq)`
\]

```{r}
rootsolve(eq, x)
dd(eq, x)
subs(eq, x, "y")
```

## Linear algebra

```{r}
A <- matrix(c("x", 2, 0, "2*x"), 2, 2)
B <- as_symbol(A)
B
Binv <- inverse(B)
Binv
tex(Binv)
```

\[
  `r tex(Binv)`
\]

```{r}
eigenvals(Binv)
```
